name: Tiger Run (Arkeyuen)
description:
Tiger RunThis game was made for Fallgamejam in 48 hours. The mother tiger escapes from the cage where she is held captive. She tries to save herself and her child.

Animator: Miray Tınaz

Coders: Talha Çekiç, Mustafa Erçin, Orkun Arslantürk, Gizem Gümüş

Level Designer: Safa Akdeniz

Sound Artist: Orkun Arslantürk

2D Artists: İdris Karakaş, Furkan Algül, Miray Tınaz

Senarists: Safa Akdeniz, Mustafa Erçin
